title: IoTsolate
description: A project using VLAN microsegmentation to identify, isolate, and neutralize security risks. Users can manually connect IoT devices to different network segments using a user-friendly app, showing network configuration and communication privileges. Built in collaboration with a partner.

title: CheckMates
description: A receipt-splitting web application built using Next.js and hosted on Vercel. It simplifies expense division for groups by scanning receipts and calculating each personâ€™s share. Built as part of a team project.

title: Personal Portfolio Site
description: This personal website, built from scratch using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, showcases my work and skills. It is fully responsive and optimized for performance.
